message: The Hacker News London meetup, of course! :) http://www.meetup.com/HNLondon/
Pub standards has always been a favourite of mine :)
The first Stack Overflow meetup is tonight (Apr 6, 2011) - http://www.meetup.com/stackoverflow/London-GB/

Going to try and go to the next HN News. I'm interested in attending a startup breakfast meetup, went to 2 in San Francisco that were good. Startup Waffles, which was quite big and early in the morning - http://bit.ly/fj8gJY The second one, Bootstrappers Breakfast was limited to a small group, I think around 10 people and it was an opportunity to round table any problems startupers are facing - http://bit.ly/htdrcg Anything like this in London?... I've been to open coffee which was OK. Anyone interested in starting something like this?
I'm going to this: http://londonlebowski4.eventbrite.com/ - it's bowling for geeks... anyone else interested, it might be a good place to meet other startupers and have some bowling fun :)
